title: [Health] Study: Fewer than 30% of workers in the US have paid sick leave protected by state law. Fewer than 60% of workers in service industries are offered paid sick leave, and fields such as food production, hospitality and retail rarely offer the benefit, leaving many employees vulnerable to lost wages.

[Health] Sexual health programs that include sexual desire and sexual pleasure can improve knowledge and attitudes around sex, as well as condom use compared to those that do not, according to new research
